text.div:
This code system http://openhie.org/fhir/openhie.vn.case-reporting.hiv/CodeSystem/cs-patient-communication-preferences defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
text-message SMS or Text messageThe client would like to receive communications via Text Message/SMS
voice-call Voice CallClient would like to receive communications via Voice Calls

name: CSPatientCommunicationPreferences
title: Patient Communication Preferences
description: The way the patient prefers to be contacted

concept.definition: The client would like to receive communications via Text Message/SMS
Client would like to receive communications via Voice Calls
